description: This file defines an interface for device communication in a security component, including function declarations for reading from a device, preparing for writing a response, and writing data, along with include guards and licensing information.

methods.name: HDK_Device_Read
methods.description: Function to read data from a device into a buffer.

methods.name: HDK_Device_PrepareWrite
methods.description: Function to prepare the output stream for writing a response.

methods.name: HDK_Device_Write
methods.description: Function to write data to the device output stream.
